definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this
Sun Wukong 孫悟空|孙悟空[Sun1 Wu4 kong1], the Monkey King, character with supernatural powers in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]

sentences.english: Like living in the mountains from the solitary who had every day.
sentences.chinese: 像躲避在深山老林居住的獨行者過每天。

sentences.english: The travellers were dismayed to find the bridge had been wash away.
sentences.chinese: 旅行者們發現橋被衝跑了，很沮喪。

sentences.english: Skywalker sought to turn him from the dark side.
sentences.chinese: 天行者期望能將他從黑暗面挽救出來。

sentences.english: Although issuer gets right gold, need to assume the market to turn over aweather danger however.
sentences.chinese: 發行者雖然收到權利金，卻需要承擔市場反向風險。

sentences.english: I also have a parakeet and a turtle named ? lider ?
sentences.chinese: 我養了一支小八哥還有一支烏龜它名叫滑行者。

sentences.english: "Come, let's enter inside", the yogi said to his disciple.
sentences.chinese: “來吧，我們一起進去”，修行者對他的弟子說。

sentences.english: This practice has nothing to do with the nation or society you live in.
sentences.chinese: 修行者也完全沒有要治國，甚至平天下的宏願。

sentences.english: Another marcher switched targets when it was his turn at the bullhorn.
sentences.chinese: 輪到另一名遊行者使用擴音器時，他轉換了目標。

sentences.english: Voyager was heading for an ocean storm.
sentences.chinese: “航行者”號正駛向一個大洋風暴。

sentences.english: Any yogis who wishes to stay in this hermitage must accept and comply to the following terms.
sentences.chinese: 任何修行者想在本禪院修行都必須遵守以下條規。

sentences.english: The bad weather detained the travellers for several hours.
sentences.chinese: 惡劣的天氣耽擱了旅行者幾個小時。

sentences.english: Comfy slip-on type shoes equals a happy traveler.
sentences.chinese: 寬鬆舒適的鞋子可以成就一個快樂的旅行者。

sentences.english: Voyager began to move down the runway, slowly.
sentences.chinese: “航行者”號慢慢的沿跑道加速。

sentences.english: It is a must to take enough water for all travelers in deserts.
sentences.chinese: 帶足水對沙漠裏所有的旅行者來說都是必須的。

sentences.english: How is the Indian Yogi Surviving without food and water for 70 years?
sentences.chinese: 印度的瑜伽修行者如何能不喫不喝維持70年之久？

sentences.english: NASA's Voyager 1 spacecraft has reached the outside edge of the solar system.
sentences.chinese: NASA的旅行者1號已到達太陽系外緣。

definition: Tripitaka (602-664), Tang dynasty Buddhist monk and translator who traveled to India 629-645/same as 玄奘
Prince Ananda, cousin of the Buddha and his closest disciple
Zhu Bajie 豬八戒|猪八戒[Zhu1 Ba1 jie4] or Zhu Wuneng, Pigsy or Pig (in Journey to the West)
tathagata (Buddha's name for himself, having many layers of meaning - Sanskrit: thus gone, having been Brahman, gone to the absolute etc)
Buddha (a person who has attained Buddhahood, or specifically Siddhartha Gautama)
to extinguish worries and the sea of grief/nirvana (Buddhism)
World Honored One/Revered One of the World (Buddha)
